Package assignment.transportation.vehicleTypes.landVehicles

Class Bus

java.lang.Object
assignment.transportation.TransportationVehicle
assignment.transportation.vehicleTypes.LandVehicle
assignment.transportation.vehicleTypes.landVehicles.Bus
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.CrewExpenses, edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.DataAccessElement
public class Bus extends LandVehicle
This class is a specialized subclass of the generalized LandVehicle class that represents an Bus.

      public Bus()
      This instantiates an empty Bus object with default null values.

    • Bus

      public Bus(String name, String type, BigDecimal weightCap, BigDecimal vol, BigDecimal cost, BigDecimal speed, int memCount, int mealCost, int crewSalary, String measurements, String description, String interestingFact, String notes)
      This instantiates an Bus object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the vehicle
      type - the type of the vehicle
      weightCap - the weight capacity of the vehicle
      vol - the volume of the vehicle
      cost - the cost of the vehicle
      speed - the speed of the vehicle
      memCount - the number of members of the vehicle
      mealCost - the cost per member
      crewSalary - the salary of the crew
      measurements - the measurements of the vehicle
      description - the description of the vehicle
      interestingFact - the interesting fact of the vehicle
      notes - the notes of the vehicle
